name: DIVERSION | Condor Retro Livery 767-31B(ER) [D-ABUM] Landing at Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
Not exactly how I wanted to film Condor's retro livery for the first time! Today, Condor flight 453 from Vancouver to Frankfurt made an unscheduled diversion to Calgary due to a medical emergency on board. The aircraft was about an hour from YYC when it diverted, giving me ample time to get to the airport and film its fairly heavy arrival on 17L, considering it was only about 2 hours into its flight before diverting here. Even though Condor serves Calgary 3 times a week in the summer, I've never managed to see this livery before. My best wishes to the passenger. ATC is included.

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Condor Flugdienst (CFG/DE)
Aircraft: Boeing 767-300ER (B763)
Aircraft Name: "Achim"
Livery: Retro (1980s)
Engines: 2x GE CF6-80C2B6F 
Registration: D-ABUM
Route: Vancouver (YVR) - Calgary (YYC) - Frankfurt-Main (FRA)
Callsign: Condor 453 heavy
Runway used: 17L
Date filmed: August 3, 2017
Local time: 1800
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/DABUM
